Description.Text:
Position Located in the heart of the Upper Tiber Valley, today Celle returns to life: the union between nature and the comfortable facilities of the Relais Borgo di Celle make it an enviable corner of paradise where you can relax and enjoy one of the most beautiful panoramic views Umbria.
Restaurant The restaurant offers Italian cuisine using only the finest fresh seasonal products, where our chef will make you taste, tasty dishes and rediscover, perfumes and fine flavors. The dishes, prepared and served with care, are accompanied by selected wines from the best wineries. The indoor dining room, furnished in the style of the Umbrian tradition, is characterized by ancient stone arches, while the outdoor terrace, ideal for ceremonies and wedding receptions, enjoy the wonderful view overlooking the valley.
